title: ISSS608
text: Welcome to ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications. This website is for Jeremy Junpeng Liu’s coursework.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)





exam_data <- read.csv("data/Exam_data_new.csv")

title: About
text: Hi there! thank you for visiting my page. This is Jeremy Junpeng Liu where l detail my journey through  Visual Analytics and Applications as part of my Master of IT in Business programme at Singapore Management University. I hope your journey is as fulfilling as mine! Special thanks to Prof. Kam Tin seong for his dedication, patience, and generosity in sharing his knowledge.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.
